description: Main entry point and core widget definitions for a Flutter note-taking app, including the home page with search, categorization, and note management features.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application that sets theme and home page.

classes.name: HomePage
classes.description: Main page widget that displays notes, manages search and categories, and handles navigation and deletion.

classes.name: _HomePageState
classes.description: State class for HomePage that manages internal state like search controller and search visibility.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point initializing necessary bindings, database, and launching the app.

methods.name: MyApp.build
methods.description: Builds the MaterialApp widget with theme and home page.

methods.name: _HomePageState.initState
methods.description: Initializes state, including loading notes provider.

methods.name: _HomePageState._addNote
methods.description: Navigates to the note editing page for creating a new note, and resets filters upon return.

methods.name: _HomePageState._editNote
methods.description: Navigates to the note editing page for editing an existing note, and resets filters upon return.

methods.name: _HomePageState._confirmDelete
methods.description: Shows a confirmation dialog before deleting a note.

methods.name: _HomePageState.build
methods.description: Builds the main UI of the home page, including app bar, search, categories, note grid, and FAB.
